name: Eldritch Escape (Coolberry Industries)
description:
Eldritch Escape is a first person Horror for the Scream Seas jam sub-theme Adrift. Seeking safe passage back to Earth on a covert science vessel, reality couldn't be further from your wishes. You awake from the ship's mandatory cryogenic sleep for non research personnel to a state of emergency. The crew have been slaughtered by a monstrous entity and the ship has been critically damaged as a result. To survive, you must send out an emergency distress signal then evacuate the ship via an escape pod, all whilst evading this ghoulish tentacled behemoth

Controls 

Movement - WASD

Interaction - E (for pressing buttons and picking up objects)

Drop Held Object - Right Click

Flashlight Toggle (with oxygen gear) - F

Crouch - Control

!!IMPORTANT!!

Any bugs/issues you need us to deal with will be our #1 priority over the duration of the jam, so please leave a comment if this affects you! Thanks for playing :)
